Profile
I have strong technical ability accompanied with key communication skills. Renowned for being safety conscious and a proactive member within a team with the ability to support and encourage the team or an individual & optimize team contribution and performance. I am continually looking to better myself and I am open to undertake any training to expand my knowledge and qualifications. Strong work ethics, values and principles with safety being the priority. Senior Electrical Engineer
Tel: +44 (0) 1415633049/+44 (0) 7974711506 Email: ptamburrini@hotmail.com
Address: 19 Bishopsgate Road, Colston, Glasgow, G21 1XD
Profile
I have strong technical ability accompanied with key communication skills. Renowned for being safety conscious and a proactive member within a team with the ability to support and encourage the team or an individual & optimize team contribution and performance. I am continually looking to better myself and I am open to undertake any training to expand my knowledge and qualifications. Strong work ethics, values and principles with safety being the priority. I am motivated and enjoy taking on challenges.  I have a proven track record in delivering results and the execution of quality work Client focused and work well on my own initiative and demonstrates the high levels of motivation and organization required to meet targets and deadlines. I am enthusiastic, reliable, friendly and hard-working individual with excellent people skills and a range of life's experiences. I am now looking for a new challenge within the industry and to bring my discipline, individual drive, commitment, and a first-class can-do attitude to delivering all work scopes safely and on time to a future employer. I have a strong commitment to work and a thriving desire to be successful!
Key Areas of Expertise
Following & advocating HSE practices
Troubleshooting & repair
Analytical & detail orientated
Solution focused attitude
Calm & composed, under pressure
Self-Starter- working under own Initiative
Tool box talks & briefing tasks
Knowledge of permit to work process
Creative Problem Solver
Interpersonal Skills
Teamwork/Leadership
Think ‘outside of the box`
Areas of Expertise
Experience with the Power Industry. Power Plant. Balance of Plant. Electrical Distribution HV/LV, Design, Construction, Commissioning and Operations.
Experience with the Power Industry. Power Plant. Balance of Plant. Electrical Distribution HV/LV, Design, Construction, Commissioning and Operations.
Experience with Transmission and Distribution Industry Up to 500kV Network. This includes Design., Construction, Commissioning and Operations.
Experience with Oil, Gas and Petrochem Industry (Onshore and Offshore) = Includes Power Plant and Power Networks.
Experience with Mining and Quarrying Industry, Design, Construction, Commissioning and Operations.
Experience with the Steel Production and Stockholding Industry Maintenance.
Project Management.
On Site Design.
Installation and Commissioning/Start Up Engineer.
Career Overview
Amey Utilities Major Projects					      June 2019 – Present
Corporate Commissioning Manager
Project: Non-Specific – High Voltage Sub Station delivery
Manage the various Commissioning Teams on Amey UK Projects.
Scheduled PMT meetings on ongoing projects and future projects.
Liaise with planning and scheduling teams.
Conduct site visits with weekly reviews of ongoing projects.
Liaise with current clients.
Liaise with the tendering team for future work
Create the commissioning structure for new sites.
Create Sub System Limits
Create the completion dossiers for each Sub System.
Liaise with Engineering Team for ongoing and future projects.
Review all drawings and as-built.
Review all documentation.
BP SCPX 					                                    August 2018 – June 2019
Senior Electrical Commissioning Engineer
Project: BP SCPX South Caucasus Pipeline Project
HUC Senior Electrical Engineer (CSG1 and CSG2)
Substations. Pre-Commissioning and Commissioning.
Solar GTG Commissioning
Implementing and supporting effective working practices and systems as required to continuously improve product delivery.
Ensuring quality assurance of all work scopes are maintained, and all work is performed in accordance with company policies and the Health and Safety at work act.
Dealing efficiently and on own initiative with a high-volume workload.
Implementation and Completion of B Scope ITR.
Implementation and Completion of CTP.
Handover to Operations Site design review for construction and commissioning.
Review all drawings and as-built.
Review all documentation.
Create and implement on site design changes.
Chevr

career_advancement: Focus on building core technical skills
Seek mentorship from senior team members
Take on challenging projects to gain experience
